abstract: Wealth Matters column presents results from DAL Investments report on returns of 306 mutual funds over 20 years; points out no one investment strategy outperformed the major indexes.
snippet: DAL Investments studied 306 mutual funds and found that no one investment strategy outperformed the major indexes.
lead_paragraph: DAL Investments studied 306 mutual funds and found that no one investment strategy outperformed the major indexes.

headline.main: The Best Investing Advice? Maybe Not the Conventional Method
headline.print_headline: The Best Investing Advice? Maybe Not the Conventional Method
headline.seo: The Best Investing Advice? Maybe Not the Conventional Method
